Desc.entry: A registered charity that provides small grants to young people aged 10-25 years, in or connected with the Sheffield Diocese. Invites applications from any group or individual for trips in the UK and abroad, start-up grants and attending events, concerts etc. The aims are to develop the spiritual, emotional and physical aspects of young people's lives.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Fri 9am-5pm (office times); 4 times per year (Applications Meetings)
